page.title: 14Home Life in Chorley
page.content: "The sun light shines into my bedroom window about 8.00a.m. but I usually don't get up. I turn my alarm clock off and get up about 8.15a.m. Then I go into the bathroom and have a wash and clean my teeth. Then I return to my bedroom, open the curtains and get dressed. While all this has been happening my mum has been making my breakfast. At 8.20a.m. my mum kisses me good-bye and goes of to work.At 8.35a.m. I set of for school with my Dad. When the school day is over and I arrive home I have a drink and a biscuit and watch television. When I have finished my drink I either practise my flute or I do some homework. I usually go to bed at about 8.30p.m.
